# 01 -> Solution

Answers are ***hashed*** using a [CRC-32 algorithm](https://crc32.online)
to make sure you can only *verify* the *correctness* of an answer,
by comparing the hashes of the solution with yours, instead of getting
the actual solution (without decrypting the [Explanation](#explanation))

## DISCLAIMER

When hashing your input ***must*** be *exactly* the same characters as the answer,
so each exercise answer contains rules on its input as well as an ***example of a
proper input***.

## Binary

`Binary Answer: -> 0x9299a269`

Input is expected to be prefixed with `0b` and contain 8 bits total<br>
Example of proper input -> `0b01000111` = `0x956f7152`

## Hex

`Hex Answer: -> 0xbe3e001a`

Input is expected to be prefixed with `0x` as well as all the
characters must be uppercase except the prefixed `x`.<br>
Example of proper input -> `0x9A` = `0x84d2e2e9`

## Explanation

[Click here for the base64 decryption tool!](https://www.base64encode.org/)
